nml_option.name: config_use_debugTracers
nml_option.description: if true, the 'debugTracers' category is enabled for the run

nml_option.name: config_use_debugTracers_surface_bulk_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, surface bulk forcing from coupler is added to surfaceTracerFlux in 'debugTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_debugTracers_surface_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, surface restoring source is applied to tracers in 'debugTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_debugTracers_interior_restoring
nml_option.description: if true, interior restoring source is applied to tracers in 'debugTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_debugTracers_exponential_decay
nml_option.description: if true, exponential decay source is applied to tracers in 'debugTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_debugTracers_idealAge_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, idealAge forcing source is applied to tracers in 'debugTracers' category

nml_option.name: config_use_debugTracers_ttd_forcing
nml_option.description: if true, transit time distribution forcing source is applied to tracers in 'debugTracers' category

package.name: debugTracersPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to include debugTracers.

package.name: debugTracersBulkRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute bulk restoring on the debugTracers group.

package.name: debugTracersSurfaceRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute surface restoring on the debugTracers group.

package.name: debugTracersInteriorRestoringPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute interior restoring on the debugTracers group.

package.name: debugTracersExponentialDecayPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute exponential decay on the debugTracers group.

package.name: debugTracersIdealAgePKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute ideal age forcing on the debugTracers group.

package.name: debugTracersTTDPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required to compute transit-time distribution forcing on the debugTracers group.

var.name: tracer1SurfaceFlux
var.description: Flux of tracer1 through the ocean surface. Positive into ocean.

var.name: tracer1PistonVelocity
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which tracer1 is restored to tracer1SurfaceRestoringValue

var.name: tracer1SurfaceRestoringValue
var.description: tracer1 is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by temperaturePistonVelocity.

var.name: tracer1InteriorRestoringRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the rate at which tracer1 is restored to tracer1InteriorRestoringValue

var.name: tracer1InteriorRestoringValue
var.description: tracer1 is restored toward this field at a rate controlled by tracer1InteriorRestoringRate.

var.name: tracer1ExponentialDecayRate
var.description: A non-negative field controlling the exponential decay of tracer1

var.name: tracer1IdealAgeMask
var.description: In top layer, tracer1 is reset to tracer1 * tracer1IdealAgeMask, valid values of tracer1IdealAgeMask or 0 and 1

var.name: tracer1TTDMask
var.description: In top layer, tracer1 is reset to TTDMask, valid values of tracer1TTDMask or 0 and 1
